verses.text: Mamin Jehová, ojtak in sik'lab'il, ix in a b'eyk'olej sik'lab'il.
Ojtac ayic tzin em k'ojan yet' pax yic tzin k'e waan. Ayocto tzojtakanel tas tzin na'a.
Ojtacxo b'ajtil tzin eq'ui yet' b'ajtil swik' wip. Ojtac pax masanil tas tzin k'ulej.
Ayic mantzac in na tas ol wala' a achxo pax Mamin, ojtakxo.
Ayachnhejek' t'a in patic wichanh, b'akhanb'at a k'ab' t'a wib'anh.
Satub'tac yoch a jelanil tik, manh jab'oc snachajel wuuj, te niwan yelk'ochi, ste sat in k'ool yuj.
¿B'ajto wal ol in b'at elelal t'a Espíritu? ¿B'ajto wal ol in b'at elelal t'a ichanh?
Tato tzin k'ek'och t'a satcha’anh, ata' ayach eq'ui. Tato tzin em t'a yol lu'um, ay ach pax ek'ta.
Tato tzin b'at t'a yichanhb'at b'aj sjawi k'u, ma tzin b'at kajan t'a sk'axepal ha' mar b'aj tz'em k'u,
palta sk'och pax a k'ab' t'ayin ta'. Tzin a quetzchaanh yet' a wach' k'ab', tzin ik'an b'eyoc.
Tato tzin na in k'ub'ejel in b'ha t'a skal k’ik’ k’inal, mato a sakil k'inal oyanoch t'a in patic tz'och k'ik'alq'uinalil,
a t'ak'walil chi' max yal-laj in sk'ub'anel t'a ichanh. Ha k’ik’ k’inal, lajan yet' sakil k'inal t'a ichanh. Malaj sk'exanhil t'ak'walil t'a ichanh, yujto saquilq'uinalnhej masanil t'ayach.
Ha ach ton ix a b'o masanil tas t'a in niwanil tik. Ha ach ix in a b'o t'a yol sk'ool in nun.
Swal wach' lolonel t'ayach, yujto satub'tac tas tza b'o'o. Sat in k'ol in naani, palta wojtak sik'lab'il to icha chi' yaji.
Ayic ix q'uib' in niwanil tik t'a yol sk'ol in nun, wach'chom manh chequeloc, palta manh k'ub'eltacoc yaj t'a yol a sat.
Ha ach ix il in niwanil tik ayic manto in aljilaj. Masanil sb'isul sk'ual in k 'inal, tz'ib'ab'il t'a yol a libro ayic mantalaj junok k'ual swila'.
Ach in Diosal, max nachajel-laj wuuj tas yaj a pensar t'ayin. Manhxo b'ischajb'enoc a pensar chi'.
Tato tzin och ijan in b'isani, ek'to sb'isul t'a yichanh k'een arena. Ayic tz'el in wayanh, ayinnhej ek' t'a ichanh.
Ach in Diosal, ik'el sk'inal heb' sk'ulan chukal. Najat tzik'kanel heb' mak'umcham anima t'a in tz'ey.
Yujto chuk tas syal heb', tzach yalub'tanhej heb' t'a chukal.
Mamin Jehová, tzin chac heb' tzach chakani, max in nib'ejlaj heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach.
Junelnhej malaj in gana swil heb', aypaxoch heb' ajk'olal t'ayin walani.
Ach in Diosal, b'eytzitej tas waji, il pax in pensar.
Ila' tato wan in b'at t'a chukal b'eyb'al, tzin a cuchb'anb'at t'a sb'eal k 'inal to aynhej t'a masanil tiempo.
